

```{r}

ecp <- read_csv("RPT-IEC-09_extracted_tables_0_5.csv", skip = 1) |> 
  janitor::clean_names() |> 
  filter(rbr !="RBR.")

ecp <- ecp |> 
  select(-x1_2) |> 
  rename(pdf_page=x1_1)
```
